programme.title: Khurana și rețeta lui
Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana
programme.desc: Aventura lui Omi Khurana la Londra s-a încheiat. Fugind de un gangster periculos din Londra, căruia îi datorează bani, Omi se întoarce în satul lui natal din Punjab, pretinzând că este un avocat prosper din Londra(n)

programme.title: Nebunie
Deewangee
programme.desc: La o petrecere cu muzica este prezentat lui Sargam ( Urmila Matondkar) de catre Ashwin Mehta ( Vijayendra Ghatge). A doua zi Ashwin este omorat. Sargam il abordeaza pe Raj pentru a apara pe cel acuzat, T B ( AJay Devgan). Raj accepta cu rezerve,si cu ajutorul unui psihiatru demonstreaza ca Tarang este nevinovat. Dar oare Tarang este cu adevarat omul care pare(n)

programme.title: Curajosul
Himmatwala
programme.desc: Un preot umil este martorul unui asasinat. Dupa un timp acesta este chemat sa depuna marturie la tribunal impotriva unui puternic proprietar de terenuri. Acesta din urma face tot ce-i sta in putinta sa-i distruga reputatia barbatului care l-ar putea trimite in inchisoare. Preotul ajunge sa se sinucida din disperare, abandonandu-si sotia si copiii cruzimii persecutorului sau de neoprit. Fiul acestuia fuge la Mumbai. Devenit barbat in toata regula acesta revine in sat si incearca sa-i faca dreptate… citeşte(n)

programme.title: Dragoste nebuna
Kyon Ki
programme.desc: Tanvi Khurana este doctor la un spital pentru oameni cu probleme mintale, iar tatal ei, Dr.Khurana, este directorul spitalului. Pacienta cu numarul 36 este externata si pleaca fara sa ii multumeasca lui Tanvi pentru ajutorul dat si din aceasta cauza Tanvi il uraste pe noul pacient cu numarul 36, Anand. Anand a innebunit dupa ce iubita lui, Maya, a murit inecata. Dr. Sunil, care lucreaza la spital, il recunoaste pe Anand, fiul omului care l-a ajutat cu bani sa invete si sa ajunga doctor si hotaraste sa… citeşte(n)

programme.title: Hoțul cinstit
Gali Gali Chor Hai
programme.desc: O satiră la adresa clasei politice despre un om obișnuit de pe urma căruia corupții oficiali ai guvernului trag foloase(n)

programme.title: Iubirea prințesei Jodhaa
Jodhaa Akbar
programme.desc: O poveste de dragoste din secolul 16 despre căsătoria aranjată dintre un împărat mongol şi o prinţesă din Rajput, pe nume Jodha, se transformă în dragoste reală(n)

programme.title: Să conduci un Ferrari
Ferrari Ki Sawaari
programme.desc: Un băiețel pe nume Kayo (Ritvik Sahore) nu se gândește la nimic altceva decat la cricket. Tatăl său, Rusy (Sharman citeşte(n)

programme.title: Fratele
Bhai
programme.desc: Kundan, un baiat simplu de la tara, ajunge ganster in Bombay. Sotia sa nu vrea ca fiul lor sa creasca in acest mediu si incearca sa il opreasca, dar lucrurile au mers deja prea departe.(n)

programme.title: Termen, 24 de ore
Deadline: Sirf 24 Ghante
programme.desc: Dr. Viren Goenka trăiește o viata luxoasa în Bombay, împreună cu soția sa, Sanjana și fiica Anishka. El a fost recent… citeşte(n)

programme.title: Inscenarea
Aitraaz
programme.desc: Studenta la drept, Priya Saxena si-ar dori sa lucreze ca asistenta a unui avocat expert. Primind o oferta de la Ram Chotrani, tanara pleaca la interviu, dar ajunge in cladirea gresita.(n)

programme.title: Dumnezeule, ce am facut?
Rabba Main Kya Karoon
programme.desc: Povestea filmului este centrata pe o nunta grandioasa din Delhi(n)

programme.title: Intotdeauna, cateodata
Always Kabhi Kabhi
programme.desc: Sameer Khanna trăiește o viață lipsită de griji alături de tatăl său Adesh și de mama sa Suman și studiază la liceul St. Marks. El se îndrăgostește de Aishwarya Dhawani, o frumoasă elevă întoarsă recent din Londra, în timp ce prietenul său, Tariq Naqvi, o place pe Nandini Oberoi. Cei patru prieteni obișnuiesc să-și petreacă tot timpul liber împreună în oraș. Într-o zi, însă, norocul li se schimbă. Aflați la o petrecere, tinerii se văd puși în situația de a… citeşte(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: When internet terrorists try to bring the US to its knees by shutting down every major computer system, NYPD detective John McClane makes a stand. All-out action sequel(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A thief enlists the help of mythical Egyptian gods to overthrow a vicious ruler(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site, and learn that some nightmares never die. Conceived and produced by Paranormal Activity's Oren Peli, Chernobyl Diaries gets underway as six thrill-seeking tourists hire a fearless tour guide, and travel to the abandoned Ukrainian city of Pripyat. Back when the Chernobyl nuclear reactor was up and running, Pripyat was the place the workers called home. But 25 years after one of the worst power-plant accidents in history, the city serves as an eerily silent testament to the dangers of nuclear power. Later, after getting unexpectedly stranded in Pripyat, the tourists and their guide realize they are being hunted. Now the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing. Only then will the unspeakable terror that stalks these deserted streets finally emerge from the shadows to launch one last relentless, terrifying attack(n)

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Jimmy Popeye Doyle and his partner, Buddy Russo, are New York City police detectives on narcotics detail, trying to track down the source of heroin from Europe into the United States(n)

programme.title: Pride and Glory
programme.desc: Gavin O'Connor's New York-set police corruption thriller starring Edward Norton, Colin Farrell and Jon Voight. When four cops are shot dead in a drugs bust gone bad, detective Ray Tierney is persuaded by his father, NYPD chief Francis Sr, to lead the investigation into what went wrong. But as Ray delves further, it becomes ever more apparent that the corruption he uncovers no only threatens scandal for the Washington Heights precinct, but is also likely to rip apart his own family, most of whom are also in the force(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of professional climbers successfully scale Mount Everest only to be faced with tragedy when a monster storm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Jason Clarke, and John Hawkes co-star. Directed by Baltasar Kormakur (2 Guns)(n)

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: Dutch filmmaker George Sluizer's award-winning psychological suspense thriller with Gene Bervoets whose agonizing three-year search for the kidnapper of his girlfriend Joanna Ter Steege brings him chillingly and dangerously into contact with psychotic Bernard-pierre Donnadieu(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: While treasure hunting in the Bahamas, a group of young divers discover a wrecked cargo plane on the ocean's floor. Within lies millions of dollars of illegal drugs, and the divers' dream of finding sunken treasure has come true. But as they argue among themselves about what to do with their prize, the friends soon realize they're not the only ones interested in the narcotics. Dangerous criminals are also searching for the drugs, and now the treasure hunters themselves have become the hunted(n)

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: Conor O'Neill is usually one step ahead of the loan sharks. But this time, his debts force him to accept a job coaching tough Chicago kids. Conor plans to take the money and run, but when the team starts looking up to him, he realises he'll have to take responsibility for the first time in his life(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Biopic of Ernie Davis, who overcame prejudice to become the first black athlete to win the highest honour in college football(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Sports biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards (Taron Egerton), whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics at Calgary marked the first time a Brit had ever competed in the ski-jumping event. Edwards trains as a ski jumper under the tutelage of a hard-drinking former champ (Hugh Jackman), and eventually finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. Directed by Dexter Fletcher(n)

programme.title: Race
programme.desc: Based on the life of legendary black Olympian Jesse Owens, who became the greatest track and field athlete in history at the world stage of the 1936 Olympics by winning four gold medals. He achieved this amazing feat under the gaze of Adolf Hitler(n)

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Boxing comedy drama about two ageing fighters who never made the big time but remain good friends. When an undercard bout in Las Vegas is cancelled at short notice, they are asked to step in. Unfortunately, they have to fight each other(n)

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: An EPA marshal (Steven Seagal) goes undercover in a mining community to investigate the murder of a friend. He joins forces with two locals, and they embark on a quest to stop a treacherous corporation that has been illegally dumping toxic waste. Marg Helgenberger, Harry Dean Stanton, Stephen Lang(n)

programme.title: Tetro
programme.desc: On the heels of the self-financed, modestly budgeted 2007 drama Youth Without Youth -- his first directorial outing after a ten-year hiatus -- filmmaker Francis Ford Coppola remains situated in the director's chair for this semi-autobiographical family drama concerning an artistic family of immigrants whose fierce rivalries span several generations. Vincent Gallo stars with newcomer Alden Ehrenreich, with Carmen Maura, Maribel Verdú, and Alden Ehrenreich rounding out the cast(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Wall Street Banker Jack Campbell has it all: more cash than he can shake a stick at, oodles of power and, above all, his freedom. But on Christmas Eve he challenges an armed robber, then on Christmas Day he wakes up to the life he would have had if he'd stayed with his college girlfriend: two noisy kids, a dead-end job selling tyres, and a people carrier instead of his Ferrari. At first he's horrified..(n)

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: John Badham's thriller about a high-schooler whose home computer gains access to the US missile-warning system(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated in this tense sci-fi thriller. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision(n)

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: Robert Zemeckis's comedy-adventure stars Kathleen Turner as reclusive best-selling writer Joan Wilder. When Joan receives a message from her sister saying she's been kidnapped in Colombia, she heads south to help her. Ending up stranded in the middle of nowhere, she bumps into adventurer Jack T Colton, who offers to help her. The two become involved in a search not only for her sister but also for a fabulous precious jewel. Hindering them are inept villains Ralph and Ira and a local bandit chief who happens to be Joan's number one fan..(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In this brutal survival tale based on a true story, 19th-century frontiersman Hugh Glass is betrayed and left for dead by his fur-trapping party after he is viciously attacked by a grizzly bear. However, Glass survives and sets out to seek revenge(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: Cop Danny Fisher must complete 12 dangerous challenges, devised by the criminal mastermind who has kidnapped his girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Elleston Trevor, director John Moore's The Flight of the Phoenix is a remake of a 1965 film of the same name starring film icon James Stewart. The story revolves around the plight of Captain Frank Towns (Dennis Quaid), a pilot whose C-119 cargo plane full of oil workers could not withstand the violent winds of a desert sandstorm. Stranded in the harsh terrain of Mongolia's Gobi Desert (a departure from the original, in which the plane crashed in the Sahara), Frank and his navigator face an equal challenge in maintaining order among the survivors. The group of oilmen had planned on an uneventful trip to shut off a group of rigs falling below their productivity expectations -- not fending for their very lives. Before long, some men are revealed as cowards, while others exhibit a surprising show of strength, all the while hoping that the wreckage of the original plane can be salvaged before a Lord of the Flies situation occurs. Miranda Otto is featured in a supporting role, as well as Giovanni Ribisi and Tyrese Gibson(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: 'On any given Sunday you're gonna win or you're gonna lose. The point is - can you win or lose like a man?' Macho stuff from director Oliver Stone , with a cast of heavyweights from both cinema and pro sport(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated in this tense sci-fi thriller. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Paul Walker puts the pedal to the metal in this high-octane sequel to 2001's "The Fast and the Furious." Walker returns as Brian O'Conner, a cop skilled at street racing. This time out, he goes undercover in Miami to take down a drug magnate. The result: relentless action, kinetic street racing and gravity-defying car chases(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Director Peter Weir's first turn behind the camera since 1998's critically acclaimed The Truman Show, Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World is based on two Napoleonic War-era adventure novels in author Patrick O'Brian's Aubrey/Maturin series, Master and Commander and The Far Side of the World. Russell Crowe stars as Captain Jack Aubrey, a high-seas adventurer who maintains a strong bond with ship-surgeon Stephen Maturin (Paul Bettany). After conquering much of Europe already, Napoleon's forces have set their sights on taking Britain, so Aubrey and the crew of his ship, the HMS Surprise, take to the Pacific to intercept any attacking ships from the French fleet. When Aubrey eyes a renegade French super-frigate, the Surprise pursues, leading to an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea. Edward Woodall, James D'Arcy, and Lee Ingleby also star as members of the Surprise's crew(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: A Los Angeles journalist befriends a homeless Juilliard-trained musician, while looking for a new article for the paper(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated in this tense sci-fi thriller. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Humans and orcs clash in this film adaptation of the popular video-game series(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company, and unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Best friends Liv and Emma discover their dream weddings have been booked at the same venue on the same date and an epic catfight ensues. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Everyone knows it takes an Undercover Brother to foil The Man. This time, The Man has launched Operation Whitewash, a plot to undermine an African-American general's presidential ambitions. But with the Undercover Brother (Eddie Griffin) on the case, alongside his sexy sidekick, Sistah Girl (Aunjanue Ellis), the general is sure to see the inside of the Oval Office. The 70's fashion-fabulous duo dons the latest in country club attire to infiltrate The Man's plan and root out his evil accomplice the White She Devil (Denise Richards)(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Cop Brian O'Conner goes undercover in LA's dangerous street-racing underworld to snare Dominic Toretto, the charismatic, hard-driving top dog. A powerhouse update of Point Break with some outstanding motors. Rip-roaring stuff(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Max Payne is a widowed cop hell-bent on delivering justice no matter what the cost as he investigates a string of killings in his city(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: When he has a vision of his flight to Paris crashing, a teen travelling with his French club makes a scene and they are all kicked off the airline. The plane goes down and the survivors are grateful, but Death hunts them down(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent goes undercover and infiltrates a group of extreme athletes in order to prove they are using their specialised skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. The film is inspired by the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this clever, offbeat Western(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: NaÏve Texan Joe Buck drifts to New York and, with the help of local wheeler-dealer Enrico 'Ratso' Rizzo, tries to make a living as a gigolo(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Paul Edgecomb is a slightly cynical veteran prison guard on Death row in the 1930's. His faith, and sanity, deteriorated by watching men live and die; Edgecomb is about to have a complete turn around in attitude. Enter John Coffey; He's eight feet tall. He has hands the size of waffle irons. He's been accused of the murder of two children... and he's afraid to sleep in a cell without a night-light. And Edgecomb, as well as the other prison guards - Brutus, a sympathetic guard, and Percy, a stuck up, perverse, and violent person, are in for a strange experience that involves intelligent mice, brutal executions, and the revelation about Coffey's innocence and his true identity(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Agnes is running away from her ex boyfriend with her new boyfriend Peter. Peter is also on the run from the military - and bugs that he believes is going to take over his body. Together they seek shelter at a small motel. Soon Agnes also sees the bugs' crawling up from every corner witch is the start for a joint battle against the bugs. Slowly paranoia and fear takes over and threatens to destroy them both mentally and physically(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is quickly losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: (2008) Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy and Morgan Freeman star in this violent action adventure from Russian director Timur Bekmambetov (Nightwatch, Daywatch). The life of office worker Wesley Gibson (McAvoy) has been one of frustration, disappointment and anxiety; he has an overbearing boss, his girlfriend and his best friend are duplicitously having an affair, and he's on medication to calm his nerves. To top it all, he one day finds himself on the wrong end of an assassination attempt. Luckily, the agile, honed and lethal Fox (Jolie) is at hand to save his life. However, she also reveals that his recently deceased father was secretly a supremely skilled killer, and that it's her job to ensure that Wesley takes his place in the Fraternity, the mystical organisation overseen by Sloan (Freeman), which exists to rid the world of evil-doers. And so begins Wesley's journey to unlock his hitherto unsuspected innate deadly abilities and use them for good. The cinematography echoes the inventiveness of Bekmambetov's earlier movies and takes a Matrix-like delight in playing with the tempo and camera angles of the fight scenes(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman won a much-deserved Best Actor Oscar for his uncannily astounding performance as "In Cold Blood" author Truman Capote. The exceptional biopic spans the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece. Catherine Keener received a Best Supporting Oscar nod as Capote's friend and researcher Harper Lee, who a few years later would publish "To Kill a Mockingbird." Dan Futterman's script was also Oscar-nominated. Clifton Collins Jr., Chris Cooper, Bob Balaban, Amy Ryan(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller in which a young woman who is half-human, half-alien goes on the rampage. Scientists have received a message from space which details the DNA structure of the alien race which has sent it, together with instructions on how to combine the alien DNA with that of a human being. Now an experiment is underway to do just this - until the little girl at the heart of the experiment breaks out of the laboratory and goes on the run. Growing up at an incredible speed, Sil is also developing some quite alien powers and presents a serious threat to the human population. A team of trackers - and assassins - has been despatched to eliminate her, but will they succeed before it is too late?(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Last Line of Defense & El Rostro
programme.desc: Last Line of Defense & El Rostro. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: A stranger steps in to save a pregnant woman from hitman Hertz. He delivers her baby and takes off, pursued by the killer and his henchmen. Supercharged actioner(n)

programme.title: Nights in Rodanthe
programme.desc: Diane Lane and Richard Gere give fantastic lead performances in this adaptation of Nicholas Sparks' best-selling novel. An unhappily married woman (Lane) retreats to an inn on the North Carolina coast, where she meets a doctor (Gere) struggling with his own crisis of conscience(n)

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: Polished and incisive remake of the 1939 classic about a sisterhood of well-to-do New Yorkers who rally around their friend (Meg Ryan) when they learn her husband is having an affair. As in the original, the film features an all-female cast, including Annette Bening, Jada Pinkett Smith, Eva Mendes and Debra Messing. Written and directed by TV veteran Diane English, who based her script on the 1936 play by Clare Boothe Luce. Rolling Stone Mick Jagger is one of the producers(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This re-imagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: When Kate dies in a bizarre accident on her wedding day, her spirit lingers, determined to stop her grieving fiancé from moving on(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: Dan Savage; Richard A. Clarke; Dan Abrams; Katty Kay; Michael Steele
programme.desc: Dan Savage; Richard A. Clarke; Dan Abrams; Katty Kay; Michael Steele. Advice columnist Dan Savage; counter-terrorism expert Richard A. Clarke. The roundtable guests are legal analyst Dan Abrams, news anchor Katty Kay and political analyst Michael Steele(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Last Line of Defense & El Rostro
programme.desc: Last Line of Defense & El Rostro. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: Newlyweds John and Jenny Grogan adopt an unruly Labrador puppy who despite being "the world's most disobedient dog" becomes a key part of their lives(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Boss'
programme.desc: A look at "The Boss," a 2016 comedy about a successful businesswoman jailed for insider trading who seeks redemption upon her release. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage, and is directed by Ben Falcone(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: A hugely successful businesswoman is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she tries to earn redemption by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this comic-book adventure set in the 1980s, the X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 07-02-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 07-02-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: An American family living in India are devastated when their young son is killed in an accident. The wife (Sarah Wayne Callies) soon performs a ritual at a Hindu temple that will let her speak to the dead, but her actions cause her family to be haunted by an otherworldly force. Jeremy Sisto, Logan Creran, Sofia Rosinsky, and Suchitra Pillai co-star. Directed by Johannes Roberts(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter retreat to what they believe is a secure sanctuary during a brutal home invasion. Newly divorced Meg Altman (Jodie Foster) and her young daughter Sarah (Kristen Stewart) move into a New York brownstone equipped with a panic room; a hidden chamber built as a sanctuary in the event of unwanted "visitors," unaware of how soon they will need it. When their home is the target of a seamless late-night break-in, Meg and Sarah take a stand from the sanctuary of the panic room, playing a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with three intruders: Burnham (Forest Whitaker), Raoul (Dwight Yoakam) and Junior (Jared Leto), during a brutal home invasion(n)

programme.title: Lost & Found
programme.desc: Just how low will a guy sink in order to impress the woman of his dreams? How does stealing her dog sound? In Lost and Found, David Spade plays Dylan, who is about to open an new restaurant and has finally found the perfect apartment. The apartment just gets better when he meets his new neighbor, Lila (Sophie Marceau), a very beautiful women who has recently come to the United States from France. However, Lila has just gotten out of a bad relationship with René (Patrick Bruel), who doesn't want to leave her alone, so she has little interest in romance, preferring to devote herself to her cello and her dog Jack. One day, Jack runs away and Dylan finds him; when he returns the pooch to Lila, it's the first time she's been willing to speak in full sentences to him, though not for very long. Faster than you can say "That idea is so crazy it just might work!", Dylan decides to kidnap Jack; when Lila thinks the dog is lost, Dylan will generously volunteer to help look for him, which will give Dylan a chance to impress Lila when he's able to find Jack so quickly. Sure enough, Dylan swipes the dog, but from that point on the plan hardly goes the way he had hoped. Star David Spade also co-wrote the screenplay with J.B. Cook and Marc Meeks; the supporting cast includes Martin Sheen, Mitchell Whitfield, Artie Lang and Jon Lovitz(n)

Amelia's ties to the deceased actress are unclear, but as other members of the porn industry turn up dead, March and Healy's investigation reveals a much bigger conspiracy than the duo could have ever anticipated. programme.desc: Colonel Matrix (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is retired and living peaceably with his 10-year-old daughter (Alyssa Milano) when she is kidnapped by the henchmen of an exiled Latin American dictator. The dictator's plan is to reinstate himself in power by eliminating the president of his country, using Matrix to kill him (or he will kill the kidnapped daughter). Matrix escapes from the plane that is supposed to be carrying him to his mission and then proceeds to go from one violent confrontation to the next as he hunts down the dictator and moves to rescue his daughter. Helping him is Cindy (Rae Dawn Chong), who has her own reasons for wanting the dictator dead(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Cole Trickle (Tom Cruise) doesn't know much about stock-car racing, but he's growing into the job, with a series of wins under his belt soon after just beginning. Almost killed in a racing accident, his convalescence in the hospital is lightened somewhat by a beautiful doctor (Nicole Kidman). programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as Axel Foley, the loud-mouthed cop from Detroit who's back to shake up Beverly Hills after chief Andrew Bogomil is nearly killed. Teaming up again with Det Billy Rosewood, who's developed an unhealthy liking for firepower under Foley's influence, and Det Sgt John Taggart, they set out to crack the 'Alphabet Crimes' - robberies from heavily guarded premises. Chief suspect is Maxwell Dent, who's protected by heavy Charlie 'Chips' Cain and assassin Karla Fry. And it's not long before the quiet of Beverly Hills is shattered by car chases and shoot-outs in Tony Scott's comedy cop-thriller(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III

It's not long before the unconventional cop is back in the famous Los Angeles suburb and teamed up with his old buddy, detective Billy Rosewood, to discover the illegal goings on in a local tourist attraction called Wonder World..(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Anarchic, nihilistic satire on modern life in which an office worker who feels emotionally deadened by his consumerist lifestyle has a chance encounter with a charismatic man. Finding that they are kindred spirits, the two men start up a no-holds-barred bare-knuckle fighting club, with the aim of making its members feel 'alive' once again. programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Director Monte Hellman and writer-star Jack Nicholson filmed this western simultaneously with The Shooting (1967). Nicholson stars as Wes, cowpuncher pal to Vern (Cameron Mitchell) and Otis (Tom Filer), who have all been hired as hands for a cattle roundup. En route to their new jobs, the men come across the handiwork of a lynch mob. Later, they find hospitality at the home of Blind Dick (Harry Dean Stanton), who graciously provides them with food and shelter. The cowboys are unaware that Blind Dick and his men recently robbed a stagecoach and murdered the driver. A sheriff (Bradon Carroll) and his posse surround the cabin and hang the thieves. Though innocent, the terrified cowboys flee. Otis is killed, but Wes and Vern escape -- with the posse in pursuit. When they stop to rest at the ranch of Evan (George Mitchell), Wes considers taking Evan's daughter hostage. Trying to steal Evan's horse, Vern is killed by the rancher, who in turn is shot by Wes. Once a law-abiding citizen, Wes has been transformed by unjust vigilantism into a killer. Fascinated by frontier era journals that he discovered in an L.A. library, Nicholson used the documents as inspiration in writing the script(n)

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: John Wayne -- showing off a darker side to his screen persona than we'd previously seen -- portrays Thomas Dunson, a frontiersman who, with his longtime partner Nadine Groot (Walter Brennan), abandons a westbound wagon train in 1851 to make his future as a rancher in Texas. Doing so forces him to abandon Fen (Colleen Gray), his fiancee -- and when she is killed in an Indian raid a short time later, it taints any good that Dunson might find in the future he carves out for himself, destroying any joy he might derive from life. The sole survivor of the raid is Matthew Garth (Mickey Kuhn), a young orphan who is unusually handy with a gun for one his age -- and already knows how to channel his grief and horror at what he's seen, as much as Dunson does. Dunson informally adopts Matt as his son, and over the next 14 years he builds up one of the largest ranches in the entire state of Texas. And all of it is worth nothing, a result of the economic ruin wrought on the state in the aftermath of the Civil War. Matthew (Montgomery Clift), now back from the war and doing some of his own adventuring, finds a darker, more taciturn Dunson than he's ever known -- as Groot tells it, he's afraid because he just doesn't know how to fight the threats he now faces. With Matthew now returned, Dunson decides to move his herd, nearly 10,000 head of cattle, to Missouri, where there is a market for beef, over 1000 miles away through territory controlled by border gangs hundreds of men strong that have stopped every cattle drive up to now, and Indians who have picked off what the gangs missed. Dunson drives his men as hard as he does himself, relentlessly, till even some of his best hands break under the strain -- and he's not above killing anyone who challenges his authority on the drive. He's able to hold them in line as long as Matthew backs him up, and he does until Dunson, exhausted and worn down by lack of sleep, finally goes too far. Matthew steps in, backed by laconic, smirking gunman Cherry Valance (John Ireland) and most of the rest of the men and takes the herd from Dunson. Leaving his father and mentor behind, he heads the herd toward Kansas, where -- so the men are told -- there's a new railroad. Along the way, he meets Tess Millay (Joanne Dru), a card-dealer who falls in love with the young man. But he has to finish the drive and leaves her behind, much as Dunson left Fen. And they all know that Dunson is coming after Matthew to kill him(n)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Marvel Comics' vigilante character The Punisher gets another big-screen outing in this third film incarnation of the character, this time from Green Street Hooligans director Lexi Alexander. Fueled by revenge and aided by his trusted weapons expert, Microchip (Wayne Knight), vigilante Frank Castle (Rome's Ray Stevenson) turns the New York City streets red with blood as he takes down each and every member of the crime syndicate responsible for the death of his wife and two kids. As the law-appointed "Punisher Task Force" closes in on him, the antihero does battle with Billy Russoti (Dominic West), aka Jigsaw, a nickname given by him to reflect the disfigurement handed to him by Castle. With the help of his psychotic brother, Loony Bin Jim (Doug Hutchison), Jigsaw recruits the criminals of the city to band together to bring down The Punisher, using the wife (played by Dexter's Julie Benz) and daughter of a slayed FBI agent as bait. Art Marcum, Matt Holloway, and Nick Santora provide the screenplay for the Lionsgate release(n)

programme.desc: Marvel Comics' vigilante character The Punisher gets another big-screen outing in this third film incarnation of the character, this time from Green Street Hooligans director Lexi Alexander. Fueled by revenge and aided by his trusted weapons expert, Microchip (Wayne Knight), vigilante Frank Castle (Rome's Ray Stevenson) turns the New York City streets red with blood as he takes down each and every member of the crime syndicate responsible for the death of his wife and two kids. As the law-appointed "Punisher Task Force" closes in on him, the antihero does battle with Billy Russoti (Dominic West), aka Jigsaw, a nickname given by him to reflect the disfigurement handed to him by Castle. With the help of his psychotic brother, Loony Bin Jim (Doug Hutchison), Jigsaw recruits the criminals of the city to band together to bring down The Punisher, using the wife (played by Dexter's Julie Benz) and daughter of a slayed FBI agent as bait. Art Marcum, Matt Holloway, and Nick Santora provide the screenplay for the Lionsgate release(n)

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: A cultural touchstone for an entire generation, Dazed and Confused chronicles the last day of school in a Texas high school in the 1970s. It's all here: hilarious comedy, authentic songs, and genuine nostalgia. Underneath all of the drug-induced insanity - indeed, what really makes the film exceptional - is a deep understanding of youth, love, and the politics of high school. An unforgettable cinematic experience unlike any other. If you haven't seen it already, you're missing out(n)

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A shallow sex-addict makes the decision to change his ways and forge a deeper connection with the opposite sex(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history(n)

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Sentimental tearjerker in which a childhood meeting on the beach in Atlantic City leads to a once-in-a-lifetime friendship for two very different women - one a brash, streetwise New Yorker, the other a well-bred San Franciscan. Through the power of letters and photographs, the two women share each other's hopes, dreams and frustrations, triumphs and disappointments(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: In this inspiring drama based on real events, a Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 1. Season 3 begins with Noah being haunted by a recent hardship and struggling to navigate the challenges of his old life while trying to adapt to a new one. A new love interest isn't enough to overcome a sense of dread. And someone is watching him(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 2. A stern request from Noah leaves Helen devastated. Meanwhile, various pressures cause Helen and Vik to reexamine their relationship; and Alison's worst fears are realized when she returns to Montauk following a crisis(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 3. Juliette, running from secrets she left in Paris, looks for adventure and romance in America. Noah is an alluring prospect but a terrifying event blasts her hopes of a carefree affair. Meanwhile, Noah must fight like never before and try to make sense of what just occurred(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 4. Alison's complicated return to Cole's life puts him in an increasingly impossible situation. Also, Alison must contend with Luisa Cole and the legal system, while attempting to reconnect with her daughter. But a dangerous passion threatens to jeopardise everything(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 5. Alison is motivated to spend a memorable day with Noah on Block Island for an unusual reason. The excursion results in a profound connection, but Noah is left wistful and the problems he was escaping return with shocking force(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 6. Noah's unexplained absence sends Helen on a journey of increasingly troublesome discoveries. Meanwhile, Noah is compelled to return to a place he's spent his life trying to escape and attempts to repair his relationship with Martin before it's too late(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 7. Helen gives Noah the help he needs, although the cost might be too high. At his absolute weakest, Noah's world has never seemed more hostile or bewildering. A vital moment of release turns suddenly into something that can't be undone(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 8. An unexpected event gives Alison reason to celebrate but it also provokes a sobering realization. Soon after, a startling warning leaves her pondering the unthinkable. Meanwhile, Cole's frustrations with Alison come to a head and reveal a radical truth(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 9. Helen's escape to Montauk exacerbates her guilt and hastens an identity crisis. Meanwhile, Noah's world collapses, leaving him to process something horrific(n)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: 10. Season 3 ends with a chance encounter offering Noah a possibility for healing a relationship that is in desperate need of repair, and his visit to Paris provides Juliette with a distraction from unpleasant realities at home(n)

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: Biopic of Edward Snowden, the former CIA contractor who leaked classified information from the US National Security Agency in 2013(n)

programme.title: Captivity
programme.desc: Jennifer Tree is America's sweetheart; a top fashion model and ubiquitous cover girl who is adored by millions, Jennifer possesses all of the wealth and power that comes with being a natural, world-class beauty. Every girl wants to be Jennifer, and every man wants to have her -- one more than all others combined(n)

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Chicago lawyer Martin Vail smells a big payday in the case of an altar boy accused of murdering a Catholic archbishop. Thriller(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: Twentysomething Mallorie (Meegan Warner) and her boyfriend August (Sean Martini) must care for her ailing grandmother Birdie (Sondra Blake), who lives alone in a Victorian mansion. However, Birdie's psychic powers soon cause Mallorie to sleepwalk and have terrifying visions. Directed by Jeff Prugh(n)

programme.title: The Green Room With Paul Provenza
programme.sub-title: Paul Mooney, Rain Pryor, Bobby Slayton, Jim Jefferies
programme.desc: Paul Mooney, Rain Pryor, Bobby Slayton, Jim Jefferies. Guest comedians are Paul Mooney, Rain Pryor, Bobby Slayton and Jim Jefferies(n)

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: Hannah's hectic lifestyle is wrecking the important relationships in her life. Because she gets into a catfight over shoes with Tyra Banks, she forgets to say goodbye when her brother leaves for college, and she's late for her best friend's sweet sixteen because she's being chased by the paparazzi. Anxious to get Miley back to her roots, her manager/father, whisks her away to their hometown in Tennessee(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A young man must take care of his troubled sister after his father passes away(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: In this inspiring drama based on real events, a Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising in this nail-biting thriller. As they attempt to reach the U.S. embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Pilot Episode. The made for TV pilot movie that spawned the notoriously bizarre drama series from David Lynch. Creating a mystery surrounding the death of teenager Laura Palmer piqued the curiosity of the masses and here we follow Agent Dale Cooper's initial investigation into her murder(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Traces to Nowhere. The first official episode of Twin Peaks, entitled "Traces to Nowhere," originally aired on April 12, 1990. Special Agent Dale Cooper (Kyle MacLachlan) of the FBI continues to investigate the mysterious death of Laura Palmer. He interrogates James Hurley (James Marshall), Bobby Briggs (Dana Ashbrook), and Mike Nelson (Gary Hershberger), and James is released from jail. Meanwhile, Bobby's secret girlfriend, Shelley Johnson (Madchen Amick), finds blood on the shirt of her abusive husband, Leo Johnson (Eric Da Re). Big Ed Hurley (Everett McGill) tells Sheriff Truman (Michael Ontkean) that his drink was drugged the previous night at the Roadhouse, and he believes Jacques Renault was tending bar. At the Great Northern Hotel, Audrey Horne (Sherilyn Fenn) begins her pattern of flirting with Agent Cooper. Also at the Great Northern, Catherine Martell (Piper Laurie) and secret lover Benjamin Horne (Richard Beymer) reveal their scheme to take over Packard Sawmill. After being released from their cell, Bobby and Mike swear to get revenge on James(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.sub-title: Zen, or the Skill to Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Zen, or the Skill to Catch a Killer. Cooper's investigation of the Laura Palmer case spills over into his dreams, while love blooms for Donna and James. Another FBI agent arrives(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Rest in Pain. A grief-stricken Leland (Ray Wise) welcomes his niece Madeleine (Sheryl Lee), who looks like Laura; Cooper and Truman question Leo; a parole officer talks to Norma (Peggy Lipton); Josie tells Truman of her fear of Catherine; tensions explode at Laura's funeral. Dr. Jacoby: Russ Tamblyn. Maj. Briggs: Don Davis(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The One-Armed Man. As Cooper tries to match his dream with Sarah's vision, Hawk tracks down the one-armed man; Hank Jennings goes before the parole board; Audrey starts her own investigation of the murder; Shelly and Bobby plot against Leo(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper's Dreams. Truman and Cooper have tea with the Log Lady and make a macabre discovery in the woods, while Donna and James pursue their own separate investigation(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Realization Time. Twin Peaks, Vol. 6 is the sixth regular-season episode of Twin Peaks, the famed, short-lived television serial from David Lynch and Mark Frost. This volume centers around the undercover infiltration of One-Eyed Jack's, another step in the investigation of Laura Palmer's murder. Agent Dale Cooper, Sheriff Harry Truman and Big Ed Hurley all explore the casino and brothel, posing as oral surgeons. Audrey Horne has also been working been her way into One-Eyed Jack's -- posing not as a customer, but as a potential employee, recruited in the same manner as Laura Palmer. Audrey winds up there on the same night as does central suspect Jacques Renault. Meanwhile, James Hurley and Donna Hayward, suspicious of Dr. Jacoby, lay a trap for him by disguising Laura's cousin Madeline as Laura, back from the dead. This installment, directed by famed cinematographer Caleb Deschanel, contains some of the most memorable moments of the series, which is characterized by bizarre comedy and surreal details within an atmosphere of brooding mystery. Especially notable scenes are Audrey's "audition" for Blackie, where she ties a cherry stem in a knot with her tongue, and the ultimate fate of Waldo the mynah bird(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The Last Evening. Cooper baits Jacques at One-Eyed Jacks, while Audrey braces for the first night on the job; James, Donna and Madeleine play their trick on Dr. Jacoby; Josie does business with Hank(n)

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: A group of close female friends on a yearly adventure vacation find themselves trapped and hunted in a series of caves by an unknown force that lurks in the shadows in The Descent, the second horror feature from Dog Soldiers writer/director Neil Marshall. After suffering a devastating car crash one year before, Sarah (Shauna Macdonald) is lured to the States with her friend Beth (Alex Reid) to a special spelunking trip by the fearless Juno (Natalie Mendoza), who abruptly fled from the U.K. after Sarah's accident. Along with two old friends and a new acquaintance of Juno's, the group embark on a cave expedition that takes a turn for the worse after a rock fall leaves them stranded in an uncharted cave with no map and only a handful of supplies to last them the rest of the trip. As tensions arise in the group, they are faced with another danger -- one whose love of the dark is as strong as its lust for blood. Opening to rave reviews in the U.K. in July of 2005, the creature-feature went on to show at the Venice Film Festival and garnered the top prize for Euro feature at Sweden's Fantastic Film Festival. The Descent was picked up for future U.S. distribution by Lion's Gate, whose work was cut out for them considering the tame opening of the similarly-themed stateside production of The Cave in late-August of the same year(n)

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Friends at a graduation party decide to hold a seance, which allows an uninvited demon into the mix(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: A recently resurrected soldier named Henry must rescue his wife (Haley Bennett) from a maniacal villain in this action movie that takes place entirely from a first-person perspective. Henry has been scientifically engineered into a superpowered warrior, and a ruthless criminal gang want to get their hands on the technology embedded in his body. With the help of gruff fellow soldier Jimmy (Sharlto Copley), Henry fights back. Ilya Naishuller wrote and directed this shoot-'em-up thriller(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: Recently orphaned teen Isabel (Sarah Desjardins) finds a sympathetic friend in a stray terrier, but soon it's revealed that her canine pal is actually an experimental android with enhanced strength and speed, x-ray vision, and the power of speech. Now teen and dog must work together to defeat an encroaching burger franchise and evade an interloper eager to snatch the robot pup(n)

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.sub-title: Billy Crystal; Martin Short; Brad Garrett
programme.desc: Billy Crystal; Martin Short; Brad Garrett. Billy Crystal, Martin Short and Brad Garrett are the guests(n)

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: Linda Hanson has a beautiful house, a loving husband and two adorable daughters. Her life is perfect, until the day she receives the devastating news that her husband Jim has died in a car accident. When she wakes up the next morning to find him alive and well, she assumes it was all a dream, but is shaken by how vivid it felt. She soon realises it wasn't a dream and her world is turned upside down. Network Television Premiere(n)

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When it looks like young Arthur's grandparents' house will be knocked down, the only way to save it is with the help of the tiny magical people that live in the garden. That is, if he can find them(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: In this nail-biting chiller, Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo. Gordo then starts giving the couple unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Three overstressed, overworked mothers decide to blow off their responsibilities and have some fun, but their wild ways cause them to clash with a rival who's dedicated to preserving the facade of her perfect life(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: Recently released from prison after serving time for a crime he didn't commit, Mo realizes that the rest of his community still sees him as a threat. He soon bonds with a woman trapped in an abusive relationship with a violent police officer, and vows to protect her from danger(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: A group of campers hunker down in a medieval Turkish town and play a mysterious party game that quickly escalates into something far more sinister(n)
